name: Sword Warriors: Heroes Fight - Epic Action RPG
name_original: Sword Warriors: Heroes Fight - Epic Action RPG
description:
Sword Warriors Premium offer you:
✅Unlock legendary support hero.
✅Free 50.000 golds.
✅Free 200 diamonds.
✅No interstitial ads.

Immortal offline Action RPG, Became a legendary warrior and fight for Glory.
Sword Warrior is free offline action RPG game. In Sword Warrior, with your blade you will become an ancient warrior to save your kingdom from the devils and dark monsters. Collect legendary weapon, a lot of equipment and summon your heroes to defeat zombie monster and devil from the dungeon. Join PVP mode to fight with the other warriors around the world.
An offline fighting game with the soul of a console RPG is not what this generation of gamers deserves, but needs! Choose your unique hero to satisfy the most hardcore action RPG fans

Features of Sword Warrior:
- Exciting hack & slash action RPG can be played offline without wifi and internet connection or join PVP mode to play online.
- Awesome graphic for strategy game and great action gameplay with hack n slash and summon friendly heroes from chaos.
- Side scrolling action for easy control hardcore.
- A lot of weapon and equipment: blade, armor, flag. Amazing character skin with samurai, ninja and demon.
- The skills each blade and equipment has will make the warrior more powerful!
- Over 120 stage, fight with the powerful summon monsters with unique skills.
- Play with other players in PVP mode and become legendary hero.

The Sword Warrior was known to have the power of ancient spirits. Who is going to stop them? You with blade are the only one to help Sword Warrior to prevent the war again.
